name: spacebar
description: SpacebarChat is a self-hosted chat platform inspired by Discord and Revolt. It features channels, roles, voice, and federation-ready protocols in a modern web UI.

features.title: Text And Voice Chat
features.description: Provides channels for text messaging and voice communication

features.title: Server Organization
features.description: Creates servers with channels, categories, and roles

features.title: Role Management
features.description: Assigns permissions and access levels with custom roles

features.title: File Upload
features.description: Uploads and shares files, images, and videos in channels

features.title: Emoji And Reactions
features.description: Uses custom emojis and reacts to messages

features.title: Team Collaboration
features.description: Shares screen during voice calls for collaboration
